meanings.definition: A member of a group of poets in ancient Scandinavia who composed and recited poems honoring heroes and their deeds.
meanings.sent1: The skalds praised the bravery of the warriors in their poems.
meanings.sent2: Skalds were known for their ability to honor heroes through their verses.
meanings.sent3: The skalds' poems were like a chorus of praise for the heroes.
meanings.sent4: His words were as powerful as a skalds' when he spoke of the heroes' valor.
meanings.sent5: The skalds' songs echoed the valor of the ancient heroes.
